DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate prevalence abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) among male patient transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) symptom . Ethiology AAA known common atherosclerotic arterial disease ( coronary artery disease , peripheral artery disease carotid artery disease ) , hypothesis AAA common among TIA patient , thus make screen patient ( AAA ) cost-efficient . Study carry prospective screening study . Data collect North Karelia Central Hospital within one year . All male patient TIA symptom recruit study screen AAA ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: Screening Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms Among Male Patients With TIA Symptoms
DOC.criteria: male patient symptom transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) Patient 's denial participate Female gender Already diagnose treat abdominal aortic aneurysm
